title: Is Ben Shapiro an Antichrist According to 1 John ?
message:
For many Christians, the Bible is crystal-clear on the subject: Anyone who denies that Jesus is the Christ (meaning, the Messiah) is a liar and an antichrist (see 1 John 2:22).
Based on that logic, Jewish leaders like Ben Shapiro and Dennis Prager, despite their conservative values and despite working side by side with Christians, are both antichrists.
But are they the ones John is describing as “antichrists” in 1 John 2:22, and should we refer to Shapiro and Prager as “antichrists,” as some Christians have done?
But is he an antichrist according to 1 John 2:22?
(After writing this article, I noticed that Andrew Torba, the CEO of Gab and often accused of antisemitism, replied to my post asking if, according to the New Testament, Ben Shapiro was an antichrist.
event_breakdown: On June 19, 2023, Yom HaShoah, a day of remembrance for the victims of the Holocaust, a gunman entered a Jewish synagogue in Halle, Germany, killing two people and injuring three others. Before the attack, the attacker live-streamed a video in which he claimed responsibility for the attack and said he wanted to kill Jews. The attacker was later arrested by the police and charged with two counts of murder and eleven counts of attempted murder.
